name: 20WavesOfChaos
description:
Objective is simple survive invasion of colored beans in cursed town. Look out for weird things near houses.

Collect weapons , ammo and discover secrets.

Most importantly  survive!

Features

  • 8 Different Weapons
  • 12 enemy types
  • Challenging gameplay

Controls:

  • WASD to Move / Mouse to aim
  • Left Click to shoot
  • F to dash
  • T to switch between weapons
